pages.name: Child(ren) Information
pages.description: Please enter the details of each child in the fields below.

elements.name: childName
elements.title: What is the name of the child?

elements.name: childDateOfBirth
elements.title: What is the child's date of birth?

elements.name: childCurrentlyLivingWith
elements.title: Who is the child currently living with?
elements.description: You can use the name of the person or their relationship to the child.
